title: Patch Notes
content:
layer name. Clarified that Pact Weapon and Hexed Weapon use Charisma as the modifier in their respective tooltips.

Icons and Portraits

Updated the icon for the Shadow Blade to better match its visuals. Fixed the Reward UI sometimes not displaying the icon of the rewarded item. Fixed the wrong variant of the Barbarian class icon appearing in Character Creation. Fixed the Lesser Hellboar's portrait, which had a golden outline. Controller, Multiplayer, and Split Screen Fixed the wrong controller
